Key Match Events: Jordan Walker had an RBI double
Lars Nootbaar homered to account for the Cardinals’ two runs
Nootbaar’s 10th homer of the year tied the game in the seventh
Post-Match Reflections: The loss dropped the Cardinals back below.500 for the season at 74-75 with 13 games remaining
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cardinals scored a total of seven runs in the three games in the series
They had a combined total of two hits in 27 at-bats with a runner in scoring position
Others: Mile Mikolas is 0-3 with six no-decisions in his last nine starts
Nolan Arenado had a single in four at-bats and in the series was 2-of-11 with both of the hits singles
